abstract: Family of Tom Benson, owner of New Orleans Saints and New Orleans Pelicans, appeals ruling that Benson is mentally fit to control teams.
lead_paragraph: The daughter of the owner Tom Benson, joined by her two adult children, appealed a ruling by a state court judge that Benson was mentally fit to control the New Orleans Saints and his other businesses.
snippet: The daughter of the owner Tom Benson, joined by her two adult children, appealed a ruling by a state court judge that Benson was mentally fit to control the New Orleans Saints and his other businesses.
